snippet: About 30 students learned that their plum summer jobs at Dewey & LeBoeuf have vanished and are now returning, hat in hand, to ask for jobs they had once rejected.
abstract: About 30 law students who learned that their plum summer jobs at financially troubled firm Dewey & LeBoeuf have vanished and are now returning, hat in hand, to ask for jobs they previously rejected; odds are against them, as many law firms booked summer jobs nearly one year ago.
lead_paragraph: About 30 students learned that their plum summer jobs at Dewey & LeBoeuf have vanished and are now returning, hat in hand, to ask for jobs they had once rejected.

headline.seo: For 30 Law Students, Dewey & LeBoeuf Internships Evaporate
headline.main: For Law Students, Dewey & LeBoeuf Internships Evaporate
